title: Alexander Hug (rugby union)
text:
Alexander Hug (born 29 August 1984) is a German <a href="List%20of%20Germany%20national%20rugby%20union%20players">international</a> <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player, playing for the <a href="TSV%20Handschuhsheim">TSV Handschuhsheim</a> in the <a href="Rugby-Bundesliga">Rugby-Bundesliga</a> and the <a href="Germany%20national%20rugby%20union%20team">German national rugby union team</a>.
He made his debut for Germany in a friendly against Switzerland on 29 September 2007.
